summary: Private-sector companies build, renovate, and maintain about 99% of family housing at military bases in the United States. However, with reports of hazards like mold and pest infestations, there are concerns about how well DOD monitors the condition of this housing. We testified about our ongoing work in this area. Military departments have increased their monitoring of privatized housing conditions, but we found they don’t...
title: Military Housing: Preliminary Recommendations to Strengthen DOD's Oversight and Monitoring of Privatized Housing
